name: Onboard with missing required fields
description: Submit the onboarding form with one or more mandatory fields empty to verify front-end and back-end validation prevents submission.
expectedOutcome: Validation messages are displayed for missing required fields; onboarding case is not created; no backend API call is made.
notes: Test scenarios include missing companyName, missing email, and missing taxId. Validate error messaging, focus behavior, and that partial data is not saved.
